019
020package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api;
021
022import java.util.Locale;
023
024/**
025 * Severity level for a check violation.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * Each violation of an audit check is assigned one of the severity levels
029 * defined here.
030 * </p>
031 *
032 */
033public enum SeverityLevel {
034
035    /** Severity level ignore. */
036    IGNORE,
037    /** Severity level info. */
038    INFO,
039    /** Severity level warning. */
040    WARNING,
041    /** Severity level error. */
042    ERROR;
043
044    @Override
045    public String toString() {
046        return getName();
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Returns name of severity level.
051     *
052     * @return the name of this severity level.
053     */
054    public String getName() {
055        return name().toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH);
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * SeverityLevel factory method.
060     *
061     * @param securityLevelName level name, such as "ignore", "info", etc.
062     * @return the {@code SeverityLevel}
063     *     associated with {@code securityLevelName}
064     */
065    public static SeverityLevel getInstance(String securityLevelName) {
066        return valueOf(SeverityLevel.class, securityLevelName.trim()
067                .toUpperCase(Locale.ENGLISH));
068    }
069
070}
